title: Asphalt Lake
creator_credit: Gaumont-British Instructional and A. Frank Bundy
brief_description: After giving examples of the everyday uses of asphalt for road-makling and roofing, this film shows the position of Pitch Lake at La Brea, Trinidad on a large-scale map. Details the work carried out at the lakeside, and in the refineries.
